ClassDesc: An object that configures how to open or create a file. Objects of this type are used by methods such as @B_java#nio#file#Files#newOutputStream_E@, @B_java#nio#file#Files#newByteChannel_E@, @B_java#nio#channels#FileChannel#open_E@, and @B_java#nio#channels#AsynchronousFileChannel#open_E@ when opening or creating a file.
